createAccountSubtitle: To get started, please complete your account registration.
imageFormatInfo: A square .jpg, .gif, or .png image 200x200 or larger
instructionsSentDescription: If this was a valid email, instructions to reset your password will be sent to you. Please check your email.
forgotPasswordDescription: Enter the email address you used when you joined and we’ll send you instructions to reset your password.
cameraAccessError: An error occurred while accessing the camera
signInError: Sign-in error, invalid credentials or account not exists
galleryAccessError: An error occurred while accessing the gallery
passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
deleteAccountConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
deleteAccountConfirmDescription: This action is irreversible and all of your data will be permanently deleted. If you're having any issues with our app, we'd love to help you resolve them.
cancelPlanConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
cancelPlanConfirmDescription: Please note that cancelling your plan will immediately revoke your access to all features. If you're experiencing any issues with our app, we'd love to help you resolve them.
noComments: No comments yet, be the first to comment
